name: L no Kisetsu: A Piece of Memories
overview: The game L No Kisetsu A Piece of Memories is a digital novel in which the player character's will explore a real world and a fantasy world. The decisions that the player take will concern in the game's gameplay and the character's feelings. The story in the real world is that the main character works in the high school newspaper and one morning a student falls unconscious and after the first one the number of victims of that strange ill increased, so the people of the newspapers decide to start an investigation and found out what is the cause of the illness.
